item.description:
Mobile-first design ensures your website works well on all devices, starting with the smallest screens.

Why Mobile-First?

Most users access websites on mobile devices, so it makes sense to prioritize mobile experience.

Key Principles

  • Start with mobile layout
  • Use responsive breakpoints
  • Test on real devices

Best Practices

Always test your designs on actual mobile devices to ensure they work correctly.

item.description:
A comprehensive guide to choosing between CSS Grid and Flexbox for your layout needs.

Grid vs Flexbox

Both CSS Grid and Flexbox are powerful layout tools, but they serve different purposes.

When to Use Grid

  • Two-dimensional layouts
  • Complex page structures
  • Precise control over rows and columns

When to Use Flexbox

  • One-dimensional layouts
  • Component alignment
  • Responsive navigation bars

Conclusion

Understanding when to use each tool will make your CSS more efficient and maintainable.
item.title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox: When to Use What
